data.name: Midnight Pulse
data.detailed_description: In this stylish rhythm platformer you will traverse an obstacle ridden terrain while listening to a wide variety of music. Listen carefully because you must base your movements off the music to successfully complete each level. Equiped with a fully functional level editor create levels with your own music and share them with your friends!
data.about_the_game: In this stylish rhythm platformer you will traverse an obstacle ridden terrain while listening to a wide variety of music. Listen carefully because you must base your movements off the music to successfully complete each level. Equiped with a fully functional level editor create levels with your own music and share them with your friends!
data.short_description: In this stylish rhythm platformer you will traverse an obstacle ridden terrain while listening to a wide variety of music. Equipped with a fully functional level editor create levels with your own music and share them with your friends!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 560 or AMD R7 260
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: System requirements may change as a result of optimisation changes throughout alpha.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.5+ GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 970 or AMD R9 290
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: System requirements may change as a result of optimisation changes throughout alpha.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: MacOS X 10.8.5
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 - ATI Radeon HD 5670, NVIDIA GeForce GT 640M
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: System requirements may change as a result of optimisation changes throughout alpha.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: MacOS X 10.8.5 or Newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 2.4 GHz+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 4.1 - ATI Radeon HD 5670, NVIDIA GeForce GT 640M
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: System requirements may change as a result of optimisation changes throughout alpha.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GTX 560 or AMD R7 260
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: System requirements may change as a result of optimisation changes throughout alpha.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04.1 LTS or Newer
  • Processor: 2.5+ GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 970 or AMD R9 290
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: System requirements may change as a result of optimisation changes throughout alpha.
